sectionText: Enrollment is limited to international graduate students in the following  categories: 1) students who receive a "Conditional Pass" on the English Proficiency Interview (EPI), 2) students who have been recommended to take ESL 508 by the SPEAK Appeals panel, and 3) current or prospective international TAs who have fulfilled their oral proficiency requirements but would like additional help with their language or teaching skills.  Contact Patricia Watts (pawatts1@illinois.edu)  to find out how to enroll.
